text: Sonic Youth is the epynonymous EP by the band of the same name. It has recieved mixed reviews. Singer Thurston Moore has said that the song "The Burning Spear" is his favorite Sonic Youth song. ==Track listing== #"The Burning Spear" 3:28 #"I Dreamed I Dream" 5:12 #"She Is Not Alone" 4:06 #"I Don't Want To Push It" 3:35 #"The Good And The Bad" 7:55 Category:Sonic Youth albums
title: Sonic Youth (EP)
